Key Match Events: Lionel Messi missed from the spot in the penalty shootout
Emi Martinez made two crucial saves in the penalty shootout
Nicolas Otamendi scored the decisive penalty
Kevin Rodriguez scored a stoppage-time equaliser to force penalties
Post-Match Reflections: Lionel Scaloni expressed dissatisfaction with the team's performance but acknowledged their resilience
Emi Martinez praised the team's trust in him during the penalty shootout
Rodrigo De Paul complimented Emi Martinez's performance
Lionel Messi had his fewest touches in a full 90-minute competitive game since 2011
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch conditions were described as rough and bumpy
Lisandro Martinez scored his first career international goal for Argentina
